_header: An angel came with full great light
Subjects: Virgin Mary, Annunciation to; carols, Annunciation
_description: James Ryman, A carol of the Annunciation — four cross-rhymed quatrains (abab) and four-line burden: ‘I bryng tydyngys thatte be fulle tru / Who can sey nay to thys / Mary is moder of Ihesu / And god ys ffader ys’

CULEe112.First Lines:
An angelle came with fulle grete lightAnd seyde haylle fulle of
                    grace…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Where thatte maydyn and moder ysWyth crist here sone so
                    ffre
